front.title: Proxy Mobile IPv6 and Mobile IPv4 interworking

abstract.t: The Proxy Mobile IPv6 protocol provides mobility management for anIPv4-only mobile nodes. It provides network-based mobilitymanagement and session continuity for the IPv4 mobile node as long asthe mobile node is attached to the Proxy Mobile IPv6 domain. Themobile node that attaches to the Proxy Mobile IPv6 domain, may alsoimplement Mobile IPv4. When a Mobile IPv4-capable mobile nodeattaches to a Proxy Mobile IPv6 domain, there are some interactionsbetween Proxy Mobile IPv6 and Mobile IPv4 that need to be studied.This document looks at a particular scenario where the mobile nodetransitions between using Proxy Mobile IPv6 and Mobile IPv4.
